name: ActivateAzureScanOptions
description:
Activate Agentless scan options for Azure subscriptions.

Use this tool to activate Agentless scan options for a specified Azure subscription. This is useful for enabling security scans without deploying agents.

parameters.name: azure_subscription_id
parameters.description: The Azure subscription ID for which to activate the scan options.

parameters.name: resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the resource type. Always use 'azure_scan_options'.

value_schema.description: The type of the resource. The value should always be `azure_scan_options`.

parameters.name: enable_container_vulnerability_scan
parameters.description: Set to true to activate scanning for vulnerabilities in containers.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in containers is enabled.

parameters.name: enable_vulnerability_scan_hosts
parameters.description: Indicate if scanning for vulnerabilities in Azure hosts is enabled. Set to true to activate.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in hosts is enabled.

value_schema.description: Indicates if scanning for vulnerabilities in hosts is enabled.
